item.title: Pragmatic AI Safety - EA Forum
item.description: Pragmatic AI Safety - EA Forum Three Pillars ML research precedents. Safety involves technical AI problems, and the ML community’s precedents enable it to be unusually effective at solving technical AI problems.

item.title: Why Being a Data Engineer is Better Than Machine Learning Engineer
item.description: Why I Prefer Data Engineering Roles Data engineers have more autonomy, less meetings, and less burden than machine learning engineering. Machine Learning engineer is overhyped.
